h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Carp Location
content: The Golden Carp Curios item can be found in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong.

The Golden Carp Curios item can be found in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong.
